search.title: Search Pull Requests
search.description: Enter a GitHub repository URL to get started.
search.leave_blank_all_orgs: Leave blank to search across all your organizations
search.leave_blank_all_public_orgs: Leave blank to search across all public organizations
search.prsGoalDescription: The system will automatically search until it reaches this goal (default: 100)

footer.text: Margea is an experimental project to explore new ways of grouping pull requests.
footer.description: A tool for analyzing and grouping GitHub Pull Requests, with a focus on Renovate Bot updates.
footer.how_to_generate_token: How to generate a GitHub token

homepage.title: Margea
homepage.subtitle: Find and group Pull Requests intelligently.
homepage.login_prompt: Log in for a better experience and to avoid API rate limits.
homepage.intelligent_grouping_description: PRs are automatically grouped by dependency and update type.
homepage.easy_export_description: Export PR groups in JSON format for further analysis.

repositoryPage.loginRequiredMessage: You need to be authenticated to search for pull requests. The GitHub API does not allow proper searching without authentication.

mainPage.useFormToSearch: Use the form on the side to find Pull Requests.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.message: An unexpected error occurred in the application.

loginPage.subtitle: GitHub Pull Request Analyzer
loginPage.reauthorizingMessage: You are changing from {{currentMode}} to a new access level.
loginPage.readOnlyDescription: View PRs • No permission to merge/close
loginPage.readWriteDescription: View PRs • Merge and close PRs in bulk
loginPage.step2: • Log in with your GitHub account
loginPage.step3: • Authorize the app according to the chosen level
loginPage.step4: • Search, filter, and manage PRs easily

prGroupDetail.writePermissionRequired: You need write permission to merge/close PRs
